availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Clement F. Satterfield (Bath County, Kentucky, student and farmhand)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, student and farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of William G. Satterfield and Mary W. Satterfield. Student in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmhand in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Sharpsburg, p. 105A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 281.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 151.
